items.title: Tata Consumer Products Q2 Results: Cons PAT rises 11% YoY to Rs 404 crore; revenue jumps 18%
items.description: Tata Consumer Products Q2 Results:  Revenue from operations rose to Rs 4,966 crore from Rs 4,214 crore in the year-ago period.

items.title: M&M Q2 Preview: Double-digit revenue growth up to 25% YoY seen on healthy volumes; weak ASP may hit profits
items.description: Mahindra & Mahindra is expected to post steady Q2 results with double-digit revenue growth led by strong auto and tractor volumes. However, weaker average selling prices and an unfavourable product mix may weigh on margins and profitability, according to brokerage estimates.

items.title: AWL Agri Business Q2 result: Net profit declines 21% YoY, revenue up 22%
items.description: AWL Agri Business, formerly Adani Wilmar, announced its second quarter results. Net profit saw a year-on-year decline of 21.3 percent. However, revenue from operations increased by 21.8 percent. The company also revealed senior management transitions. These changes include new appointments to key leadership roles. The stock experienced a dip following the announcement.
